content: is located in the centre of the back fourth marker section the sweater is now divided into four sections back german short row are worked symmetrically back and sleeve front sleeve with markers to note the location forth to lower the front neckline of the raglan seams where all the increasing will take short row 1 rs *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 place the bor will act as the fourth raglan marker at sm k1 m1l repeat from * once more k 1 1 2 2 sts the back-left shoulder turn work raglan round 1 *k1 m1l k to 1 st before marker short row 2 ws wyif sl1 purlwise ds p to bor sm m1r k1 sm repeat from * three more times 8 sts *p to 1 st before marker m1lp p1 sm p1 m1rp increased repeat from * once more p 1 1 2 2 sts turn work 8 raglan round 2 k all sts slipping markers as you go sts increased in row 1 + 2 repeat raglan rounds 1 & 2 6 7 7 9 10 11 11 12 short row 3 rs wyif sl1 purlwise ds k to bor sm 13 14 15 16 17 19 19 22 25 29 more times *k to 1 st before marker m1r k1 sm k1 m1l repeat from * once more k to ds and knit both loops as if 1 st 122 136 148 164 174 192 196 212 226 240 252 k2 turn work 262 270 296 314 344 370 404 sts 39 44 48 52 55 60 62 66 71 74 78 81 83 92 99 108 115 124 short row 4 ws wyif sl1 purlwise ds p to bor sm sts for each front and back 22 24 26 30 32 36 *p to 1 st before marker m1lp p1 sm p1 m1rp 36 40 42 46 48 50 52 56 58 64 70 78 sts for repeat from * once more p to ds and purl both loops as each sleeve if 1 st p2 turn work 8 sts increased in row 3 + 4 continue to k all sts without increasing until work repeat short row 3 & 4 another 0 0 0 1 1 2 2 3 3 measures 4 25 4 5 5 5 5 6 6 5 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 9 5 3 3 4 4 4 4 5 5 5 more times 10 10 5 11 12 13 14 from the cast on edge return to bor rs wyif sl1 purlwise ds k to bor sm yoke raglan with short row resume working in the round following raglan increasing instructions below in the first round k any set up round a ds as if they were a single st size 0-6 mo 6-12 mo k all sts raglan
